snippet.title: Plants vs. Zombies Heroes Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Plants vs. Zombies Heroes is now available worldwide! You can download Plants vs. Zombies Heroes on the iTunes AppStore and Google Play: http://smarturl.it/pvzhyt

A new take on collectible card games, Plants vs. Zombies Heroes gives you the chance to choose your favorite super-powered plant or zombie hero, assemble a team, and battle against friends and foes. Collect hundreds of new and familiar PvZ characters, build a winning team, and take to the arena in ranked or friendly multiplayer matches. You'll also be able to adventure through a comic-style singleplayer adventure through over 40 different levels, letting you hone your skills, discover new characters, and confront mighty opponents along the way.

Find out more here: http://www.pvzheroes.com/
